text: The men's doubles tennis event of the 2011 Pan American Games was held from October 18–22 at the Telcel Tennis Complex in Guadalajara.Tennis technical manual The defending Pan American Games champion is Eduardo Schwank and Horacio Zeballos of Argentina. __TOC__ ==Seeds== ==Draw== Men's doubles draw ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== Men's Singles
title: Tennis at the 2011 Pan American Games – Men's Doubles
